availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Smiley (Caldwell County, kentucky, student and farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, student and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Smiley and Isabelle Smiley. Married to Mary E. Coates Smiley in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 9, 1865. Resident in Caldwell County in 1850. Student and farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 365B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 12.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546374.
